Bash(git commit -m "chore: exclude Docs/archive/ from git tracking + add migration plan

1. Archive Directory Management:
   - Added Docs/archive/ to .gitignore
   - Removed 80 historical files from git tracking (1.1MB)
   - Files remain on disk for local reference
   - Keeps git history clean and focused

2. Future Planning:
   - Created FUTURE_DASHBOARD_MIGRATION.md
   - Option B: Plotly Dash (Q1 2026, after 5 customers)
   - Option C: React + FastAPI (Q2-Q3 2026, after 20 customers)
   - Revenue-driven upgrade strategy documented

Rationale:
- RAG docs (184KB): KEEP - actively used by AI assistants
- Archive (1.1MB): REMOVE - historical clutter, not needed in git
- Best practice: Living documents in git, dead documents local only

Bash(find Docs/ -name "*.md" -type f -exec sed -i 's/LINBORG/NordIQ Metrics Framework/g' {} +)
Bash(find NordIQ/src/ -name "*.py" -type f -exec sed -i 's/LINBORG/NordIQ Metrics Framework/g' {} +)
Bash(find NordIQ/src/ -name "*.py" -type f -exec sed -i 's/from linborg_schema import/from nordiq_metrics import/g' {} +)
Bash(find NordIQ/src/ -name "*.py" -type f -exec sed -i 's/NordIQ Metrics Framework_METRICS/NORDIQ_METRICS/g' {} +)

Bash(git commit -m "refactor: rebrand LINBORG to NordIQ Metrics Framework

Complete rebranding of proprietary term LINBORG to NordIQ Metrics Framework:

1. Core Module Rename:
   - Renamed linborg_schema.py â†’ nordiq_metrics.py (git mv)
   - Updated all imports from core.linborg_schema to core.nordiq_metrics

2. Constant Renaming:
   - LINBORG_METRICS â†’ NORDIQ_METRICS
   - LINBORG_CRITICAL_METRICS â†’ NORDIQ_CRITICAL_METRICS
   - LINBORG_DISPLAY_METRICS â†’ NORDIQ_DISPLAY_METRICS
   - validate_linborg_metrics() â†’ validate_nordiq_metrics()
   - SCHEMA_VERSION: 1.0.0_linborg â†’ 1.0.0_nordiq

3. Variable Renaming:
   - linborg_metrics â†’ nordiq_metrics (in daemon code)
   - Updated METRICS_CONFIG dict key

4. Files Updated (385 references total):
   - All 50 documentation files in Docs/ (global search-replace)
   - 7 website HTML files (NordIQ-Website/)
   - 28 Python files in NordIQ/src/
   - Training modules (tft_trainer.py, main.py)
   - Daemon modules (tft_inference_daemon.py, metrics_generator_daemon.py)
   - XAI explainers (shap_explainer.py, attention_visualizer.py, counterfactual_generator.py)
   - Dashboard tabs and utilities
   - Configuration files

5. Preserved Legacy Database Names:
   - Elasticsearch index patterns (linborg-metrics-*) - production compatibility
   - MongoDB database name (linborg) - production compatibility
   - These are actual database identifiers, not framework names

Rationale:
LINBORG is a proprietary system that end users won''t recognize.
NordIQ Metrics Framework is clearer, branded, and more professional.

Tested:
âœ… python -m core.nordiq_metrics executes successfully
âœ… All 14 metrics validated
âœ… Schema version updated to 1.0.0_nordiq
